name: taskease
description: ## TaskEase is a simple and intuitive todo application built using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. It provides users with a convenient way to manage their tasks and stay organized. With TaskEasy, you can easily create, update, and delete tasks, and prioritize your to-do items. The application ensures that your tasks are securely stored and readily accessible whenever you need them. TaskEase offers a user-friendly interface and efficient task management capabilities.
author: Pratham Patel
